org.apache.felix.ipojo.handlers.dependency

Class Dependency.SmartProxyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • org.apache.felix.ipojo.handlers.dependency.Dependency.SmartProxyFactory
  • Enclosing class:
    Dependency

    private class Dependency.SmartProxyFactory
extends ClassLoader
    Creates smart proxy object for proxied scalar dependencies.

      • getProxy

        public Object getProxy(Dependency dep)
        Create a proxy object for the given specification. The proxy uses the given dependency to get the service object.
        Parameters:
        dep - the dependency used to get the service
        Returns:
        the proxy object.

      • loadClass

        public Class loadClass(String name)
                throws ClassNotFoundException
        Loads the given class. This method uses the classloader of the specification class or the handler class loader.
        Overrides:
        loadClass in class ClassLoader
        Parameters:
        name - the class name
        Returns:
        the class object
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if the class is not found by the two classloaders.
        See Also:
        ClassLoader.loadClass(java.lang.String)
